comment: I've thought long and hard about this and...I don't care. This was a Saudi citizen killed by Saudis on Saudi property. And so what if he was a journalist? If anything, that makes me think less of him, considering today's state of journalism. There's nothing here that merits another potential useless, bloody mid-east ground war.
